text: Harry Gration, MBE, DL (22 October 1950 â€“ 24 June 2022) was an English journalist and broadcaster. He was one of the main anchors for the BBC Yorkshire programme Look North. Gration died suddenly on 24 June 2022, at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * BBC presenter profile. * TV Newsroom * Returning to the BBC Leeds studio in 1999 Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English journalists Category:British television presenters Category:Television news anchors Category:Writers from Yorkshire
